comments.body: How do we know this does not support Python 3.x? We should ask upstream to get some trove classifiers to make this clearer as to what Python versions are supported.

It would likely support python 3.x with some trivial patching. I didn't include it because of this error during the import test:

```
===== testing package: splits-0.1.1-py35_0 =====
import: 'splits'
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/opt/anaconda3/conda-bld/splits_1474254447005/test_tmp/run_test.py", line 27, in <module>
    import splits
  File "/opt/anaconda3/conda-bld/splits_1474254447005/_t_env/lib/python3.5/site-packages/splits/__init__.py", line 1, in <module>
    import writers
ImportError: No module named 'writers'
TESTS FAILED: splits-0.1.1-py35_0
```
